blogs.title: The Future of JavaScript
blogs.body: JavaScript continues to evolve with new features like ESNext, improving performance and developer experience.
blogs.author: John Doe

blogs.title: Understanding React Hooks
blogs.body: React hooks simplify state management and side effects, making functional components more powerful.
blogs.author: Jane Smith

blogs.title: Why Node.js is Great for Backend Development
blogs.body: Node.js provides a non-blocking event-driven architecture, making it perfect for scalable web applications.
blogs.author: Mike Johnson

blogs.title: MySQL vs MongoDB: Which One Should You Choose?
blogs.body: MySQL is relational, while MongoDB is NoSQL. The choice depends on your application requirements.
blogs.author: Emily Davis

blogs.title: Vite: The Next Generation Frontend Tooling
blogs.body: Vite offers fast development with hot module replacement, making it a great alternative to Webpack.
blogs.author: Chris Wilson
